name: 方圈 Square Circle
description:
Here used to be a world full of color and vitality!
One day, the colorful origin stones that make up the world were exploded into seven pieces, scattered around the world!
The world has become dull and monotonous ever since.
It is said that as long as we can retrieve the scattered 7 origin stones, we can see the world full of color and vitality before!
......

Game features

  • Unique style, showing a dull and monotonous world!
  • Clever level design, so that players enjoy the fun of solving puzzles!
  • Simple plot and change of characters,Let the player understand the story that the game wants to express more!
